member_organisations:
Funding Fish is a grant making collaborative, with a pooled fund from the following foundations: 
Adessium Foundation 
Waterloo Foundation 
Marisla Foundation 
David and Lucile Packard Foundation 
Oak Foundation 
Calouste Gulbenkian Foundation 
IF International Foundation 
 
Our Fish is an initiative of Funding Fish, and works in partnership with Deutsche Umwelthilfe in Germany.  
 
Neither Our Fish nor Funding Fish has a general public membership.
eu_initiatives: Common Fisheries Policy including TACs, control and enforcement, Landing Obligation, quota allocation
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication:
Funding Fish gives grants to organisations for projects that support the implementation of the CFP. In addition, we will work with our potential partners to identify matching funding, develop projects and provide other in kind services. Funding Fish has also launched the Our Fish initiative.  
We engage with media, social media, NGOs, scientists, the seafood supply chain, politicians, industry and other stakeholders in the pursuit of sustainable fisheries management in Europe. We do this through events, meetings, publications, media and direct communications.
goals__remit: The aim is to achieve sustainable fisheries in Europe. We do so through supporting the implementation of the Common Fisheries Policy.
